channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for RI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for RI

item.title: Report E-2024110162
item.description:
Report E-2024110162

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-10T12:20:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-18
  • City: WOONSOCKET
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: EQ NORTHEAST, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Metal IBC loaded with approx. 250 gals of product herein described. No problems during loading nor during transit to transfer facility where said IBC to be carried on to final disposal facility. During post-trip load inspection, driver discovers approx 50-100 ml of material seeped out of gasket on top manhole closure. A replacement gasket was applied to the closure and integrity assured. Small cleanup of material (limited to small puddle on top of tank- no product seeped to floor of truck) conducted. Package continued without further incident to final destination/disposal.
